author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign Guardian Guide - How to play Guardian in Nightreign
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, we're going to take a look at Guardian and how to play him in combat. We'll cover his stats, skills, recommended relics, weapons to look out for, and how to use him effectively in a party. So if you're playing Guardian or planning to learn this class, then this video is for you.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

Timestamp:
0:00 Nightreign Class Guide
0:21 Guardian Guide
7:35 Guardian Skills
12:09 Guardian Weapons and Passives
14:11 Guardian Relics
15:27 Party Composition
16:21 Final Thoughts

author: Fextralife
description:
Crystal of Atlan Gameplay Preview - SHOULD You PLAY It? Is It Worth it?
In this Crystal of Atlan video, we'll be exploring the core gameplay of the new free to play MMORPG, and I'll be giving you a look at the range of modes and features available to it at launch, which is today. Crystal of Atlan has a bright anime like esthetic, and it has an expansive class system, several game modes, and strong combat that is easy to pick up but hard to master.

Gameplay is based on the Closed Beta Test 2 Version and the final content and experience may differ in the official launch
Sponsored by:  Skystone Games

Timestamp:
0:00 - Crystal of Atlan Gameplay Preview
0:31 - What is Crystal of Atlan
1:25 - Crystal of Atlan Gameplay
3:22 - Crystal of Atlan Classes
5:35 - Game modes and Exploration
9:47 - Crystal of Atlan Shop
11:03 - Final Thoughts

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!

author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign Beginner Guide – MUST KNOW TIPS Before You Play
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, I'm going to be giving you guys some beginner tips to help you get going in Nightreign. This video is not only for people who haven't played Nightreign before. It's also for people who have played the network test and have a basic understanding of the game. So some of these first tips are going to be for brand new players. And a refresher for some of you who haven't played in a while. And then some of the later tips in this video are going to be kind of helping you as you make your way through the game to get the most of out it.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

1:32 Nightreign Matchmaking

5:03 Stay with Your Team
5:31 Relics 101
6:56 Level Up ASAP
8:03 Visit Churches As Much as Possible
8:48 Avoid easy enemies w
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Gameplay Tips - Beginner Guide to help you win!
